# Extendicare## PROCEDURE**MANUAL:** Infection Prevention and Control
**INDEX:** IPC4-P10.03
**SECTION:** Infection Surveillance
**EFFECTIVE DATE:** February 18, 2025
**REVIEWED DATE:** February 11, 2025
**APPROVED BY:** Chief Medical Officer
**MODIFIED DATE:** May 30, 2025----## POLICY### Infection Surveillance### PROCEDURE- The home shall have a list of reportable diseases and conditions for their respective province/region. - The home shall ensure that staff has access to a current list of reportable diseases and conditions. - The home shall adhere to all local, regional, provincial, and federal reporting requirements. - If needed, additional training and education on any required care requirements will be provided to staff. - Update the resident’s plan of care with any care-related requirements for the infectious disease including additional precautions, if required. - In the event of an outbreak, the home will refer to the policies and procedures related to outbreak management.### External#### LTC Manitoba Specific:
- Reporting of Diseases and Conditions Regulation, M.R.
